title: Client/Ingame Issues @Riot
body:
When I log into the game the client shows without anything loaded, completely Blacked out. it freezes my computer stoping anything from working for 10-15 seconds then it works again.

everytime I enter champion select the Client Spazzes out and the LoL Icon on my taskbar? menubar at the bottom of my screen glitches out and stutters out completely. takes a couple of seconds to Click and hold it in place so the client works.

And when ingame, if i Alt-Tab quickly to do something I cannot get back into the game. Everytime I click back on the client to Pop it back up to quickly resume playing it wont enable the click/pop back into the game and nothing happens no matter what I try.

I've Deleted every League of legends file on my computer. Redownloaded league, (still happening ^) I've done a client repair and its still happening.

I'm not sure how/what is going on. I'm running on fumes right now, so frustrating to play.

Any kind of help would be very appreciated !
